files.Title: PAC.Colour.Compositing.AlphaCompositing.Premultiplied
files.Summary: Alpha compositing methods where the colours are in premultiplied alpha form.

files.Title: PAC.Colour.Compositing.AlphaCompositing.Straight
files.Summary: Alpha compositing methods where the colours are in straight alpha form.

files.Title: PAC.Colour.Compositing.AlphaCompositing
files.Summary: Methods for combining two colours based on their alpha values.

files.Title: PAC.Colour.Compositing.BlendMode
files.Summary: Defines how a foreground colour (the top colour) is blended onto a background colour (the bottom colour) to form a new colour, ignoring their alpha.

files.Title: PAC.Colour.HSL
files.Summary: A colour in HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness) form with no alpha component.

files.Title: PAC.Colour.HSLA
files.Summary: A colour in HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness) form with an alpha component.

files.Summary: A colour in HSV (Hue, Saturation, Value) form with an alpha component.

files.Summary: Extension methods for .

files.Summary: A set of consecutive integers.

files.Summary: A fraction a / b (where a and b are integers) kept in simplest form.

files.Title: PAC.Exceptions.TestException
files.Summary: Indicates that an exception arose when running a test. Used to add an extra message, such as printing the test case, on top of the exception that occurred in the test.

files.Title: PAC.Exceptions.UnreachableException
files.Summary: Indicates that logically this code should not be reachable.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Direction8
files.Summary:
One of the following 8 directions:

  • Down-Right
  • Down-Left

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.IntRect
files.Summary: A non-empty rectangular region of integer coordinates.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.IntVector2
files.Summary: A 2-dimensional vector with integer coordinates.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Plane2D.Octant
files.Summary: One of 8 regions of the 2D plane.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Plane2D
files.Summary: Provides ways to deal with the 2D plane.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.QuadrantalAngle
files.Summary: An angle that's a multiple of 90 degrees.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Diamond
files.Summary:
A pixel art diamond shape. For example,

    #
    #
  #   #
  #   #
#       #
#       #
  #   #
  #   #
    #
    #

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Ellipse
files.Summary:
A pixel art ellipse shape. For example,

    # # # #
  #         #
#             #
#             #
  #         #
    # # # #

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Extensions.IShapeExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for .

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.I1DShape<T>
files.Summary: A pixel art representation of a 1D shape (such as a straight line, or a curve).

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.I2DShape<T>
files.Summary: A pixel art representation of a 2D shape (such as a rectangle or a circle).

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.IDeepCopyableShape<T>
files.Summary: An that can be deep-copied.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.IFillableShape
files.Summary: An that encloses a region that can be filled in.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.IFlippableShape<T, A>
files.Summary: An that can be flipped.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.IIsometricShape<T>
files.Summary: A pixel art representation of the isometric projection of a shape.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.IRotatableShape<T>
files.Summary: An that can be rotated.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.IShape
files.Summary: Defines a non-empty collection of integer points that make up a pixel art shape. The shape must be connected (including diagonally).

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.ITransformableShape<T, A>
files.Summary: An that can be translated, flipped and rotated.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Interfaces.ITranslatableShape<T>
files.Summary: An that can be translated.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.IsometricCuboid
files.Summary:
An isometric pixel art cuboid shape. For example,

        # #
    # #     # #
# #             # #
#   # #             # #
#       # #     # #   #
#           # #       #
# #           #       #
    # #       #     # #
        # #   # # #
            # #

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.IsometricHexagon
files.Summary:
An isometric pixel art hexagon shape. For example,

          # #
      # #     # #
  # #             # #
#                     #
#                     #
#                     #
#                     #
#                     #
  # #             # #
      # #     # #
          # #

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.IsometricRectangle
files.Summary:
An isometric pixel art rectangle shape. For example,

        # #
    # #     # #
# #             # #
    # #             # #
        # #     # #
            # #

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Line
files.Summary:
A pixel art straight line. For example,

            #
        # #
      #
  # #
#

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Path
files.Summary:
A sequence of connected s. For example,

       end of line 1
      start of line 2    # < end of line 3
             v           #
             # #         #
           #     # #     # < start of line 3
         #           # #
       #               ^
       ^         end of line 2
start of line 1

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.Rectangle
files.Summary:
A pixel art rectangle shape. For example,

# # # #
#     #
# # # #

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.RightTriangle.RightAngleLocation
files.Summary: Which corner of the the right angle is in.

files.Title: PAC.Geometry.Shapes.RightTriangle
files.Summary:
A pixel art right-angled triangle shape. For example,

            # #
        # #   #
      #       #
  # #         #
#             #
# # # # # # # #

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonConversion.JsonConverter<T, JsonDataType>
files.Summary:
An interface that custom JSON converters must implement.

NOTE: Has a default implementation for an overload FromJson(JsonData jsonData) that ensures it is of type JsonDataType before calling the specific overload FromJSON(JsonDataType jsonData).

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonConversion.JsonConverterSet
files.Summary: Represents a set of JsonConverter objects, making sure there's at most one custom converter for each type. For example, a class MyClass cannot have two JSON converters defined for it in the list.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonConverters.JsonConverters.ColorJsonConverter
files.Summary: Custom JSON converter for Color.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonConverters.JsonConverters.Texture2DJsonConverter
files.Summary: Custom JSON converter for Texture2D.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonConverters.JsonConverters.Vector2JsonConverter
files.Summary: Custom JSON converter for Vector2.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonConverters.JsonConverters.Vector3JsonConverter
files.Summary: Custom JSON converter for Vector3.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonData.Bool
files.Summary: Represents a bool in JSON data.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonData.Float
files.Summary: Represents a float in JSON data.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonData.Int
files.Summary: Represents an int in JSON data.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonData.List
files.Summary: Represents a non-null list/array in JSON data.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonData.Null
files.Summary: Represents a null value in JSON data.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonData.Object
files.Summary: Represents a non-null object in JSON data.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonData.String
files.Summary: Represents a non-null string in JSON data.

files.Title: PAC.Json.JsonData
files.Summary: Represents a piece of JSON data.

files.Title: PAC.KeyboardShortcuts.CustomKeyCode.JsonConverter
files.Summary: Custom JSON converter for CustomKeyCode.

files.Title: PAC.KeyboardShortcuts.CustomKeyCode
files.Summary: A class to supersede Unity's KeyCode enum to allow keycodes to refer to multiple keys - e.g. Shift instead of separated into LeftShift and RightShift.

files.Title: PAC.KeyboardShortcuts.KeyboardShortcut.JsonConverter
files.Summary: Custom JSON converter for KeyboardShortcut.

files.Title: PAC.KeyboardShortcuts.KeyboardShortcut
files.Summary: A class to represent a single keyboard shortcut.

files.Title: PAC.KeyboardShortcuts.KeyboardShortcuts
files.Summary: A class for storing, loading and accessing keyboard shortcuts for defined actions.

files.Title: PAC.Managers.AnimationManager
files.Summary: Handles the animation timeline and playback of animations. The animation system is still a work in progress.

files.Title: PAC.Managers.Clipboard
files.Summary: A class to handle copy/paste functionality. Not yet properly implemented.

files.Title: PAC.Managers.GridManager
files.Summary: Handles drawing a grid over the image when the grid is enabled.

files.Title: PAC.Managers.KeyboardShortcutOptionsManager
files.Summary: Handles the window where you can view / change keyboard shortcuts.

files.Title: PAC.Managers.Toolbar
files.Summary: Handles selecting tools, brush size, etc.

files.Title: PAC.Maths.Combinatorics
files.Summary: A collection of common combinatorial functions, such as computing factorials or generating all permutations of a set.

files.Title: PAC.Maths.MathExtensions
files.Summary: Defines some mathematical functions.

files.Title: PAC.Patterns.Checkerboard<T>
files.Summary:
A repeating pattern of two values where horizontally/vertically adjacent points do not have the same value (unless the two values of the checkerboard are the same).

For example, with r = red, b = blue: 

          .
          .
          .
      r b r b r
      b r b r b
. . . r b r b r . . .
      b r b r b
      r b r b r
          .
          .
          .

files.Title: PAC.Patterns.Extensions.IPattern2DExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for .

files.Title: PAC.Patterns.Gradient.Linear
files.Summary:
A gradient that linearly interpolates from the colour of to the colour of based on how far a point is in the direction of the vector between these two endpoints.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_gradient#Axial_gradients

files.Title: PAC.Patterns.Gradient.Radial
files.Summary:
A gradient that linearly interpolates from the colour of to the colour of based on the distance of a point from the .

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_gradient#Radial_gradients

files.Title: PAC.Patterns.Gradient
files.Summary: Provides a collection of gradient patterns.

files.Title: PAC.Patterns.IPattern2D<T>
files.Summary: Represents an algorithm to assign a value to each point in the 2D plane.

files.Title: PAC.Tools.CoordSnapping
files.Summary: Provides methods to snap coordinates so they fit certain properties, such as forming a square.

files.Title: PAC.Tools.Tool
files.Summary: Defines the tools available to use and their properties.

files.Title: PAC.Tools.Tools
files.Summary: Defines how different tools act. I may rework this to be more like the BlendMode class where each Tool instance defines how it acts. Then to use a tool you would just do tool.Use(pixel) or similar.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.EffectPanels.BlurPanel
files.Summary: A panel that blurs the view behind it.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.EffectPanels.EffectPanel
files.Summary: A class to represent a type of panel that applies an effect to the view behind it - e.g. a blur panel or a pixellate panel.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.EffectPanels.PixellatePanel
files.Summary: A panel that pixellates the view behind it.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.Specialised.Animation.FrameNotch
files.Summary: A class for the frame number markers on the animation timeline.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.Specialised.Animation.KeyFrameIcon
files.Summary: Stores the data about a keyframe icon on the animation timeline.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.Specialised.ColourPicker.ColourPreview
files.Summary: A class to represent colour previews - the boxes on colour pickers that show what colours you have selected.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.Specialised.ColourPicker.GlobalColourPicker
files.Summary: A class for the main colour picker in the program - the one that appears in the main view.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.Specialised.ColourPicker.HSLColourPicker
files.Summary: A class for the HSL colour picker.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.Specialised.ColourPicker.HSLHueSaturationBox
files.Summary: A class for the hue/saturation box of the HSL colour picker.

files.Title: PAC.UI.Components.Specialised.ColourPicker.HSLLightnessSlider
files.Summary: A class for the lightness slider of the HSL colour picker.
